attributes.action: Save our Country (help with child care and cut benifits)
attributes.additional_details:
School is free, why not child care, why dont the Goverment put what they put into giving away benifits to pay for child care from the age of 1.

Pay the wages of staff, create jobs, create places for single mums, single dads, people who are scared to go back to work, people who live off the country.

Cut benifits, every one should be entitled to 1 year from the birth of there child to have benifits, then from the age of 1 a placement given to the child to enable parents to go back to work, no choice as there child care is free and the money the Goverment will save on benifits can be put into child care, putting and end to the benifit crisis we have today.

Enabling our country to get back on its feet. Forcing people to build their lives and enabling independance.
